name: Turtle Tanks
description:
He's Fast, He's Furious, And He's Mad...
He is... Special Agent Green, Turtle Tank Operative.
Blast your way through Nazi compounds, destroy fortifications in the Tundra, Lay siege to Berlin, Ride V-2 Missiles and even survive the depths of Turtle Hell in this explosive over-the-top shooter with a Monty Python sense of humor!
